trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Yuba City
There were no other sightings in Yuba City on or around August 16th 2004
Summary: Large, Large light in the middle, 3 lights on the outside, Small flare out the back.
divs: Sighting DetailsOkay, so I was out going to pick up a friend to get a trampoline at a store called "Sam's Club", I was loading up the truck with the trampoline when I took a break for a second when I looked up then there it was. I saw large triangle in the sky with a large light in the middle, 3 lights on the outside, and a small flare out the back. I thought it was a flying low but then realized how slow it was going. When I told my friend to look up he didn't believe me, when he finally looked up it vanished. I had no reaction to the mysterious object other than more proof that there is life out there. I always carried a camera with me after that sighting, next time I will get footage with my 1080p camera.
